strings.ITEM_STUNANDPIERCE_PICKUP: Throw up to 2 electric boomerangs on hit with a skill that can stun.
strings.ITEM_STUNANDPIERCE_DESC: On hit with <style=cIsUtility>a skill that can stun</style>, throw an electric boomerang that slices through enemies <style=cIsUtility>stunning</style> and dealing <style=cIsDamage>375% <style=cStack>(+275% per stack)</style></style> TOTAL damage every hit. <style=cSub>The boomerang can hit an enemy multiple times. Can have up to 2 boomerangs out at once.</style>
